headline.main: Transport Elliott Destroyed in Solomons When Torpedo Bomber Crashed Into Hatch

lead_paragraph: PEARL HARBOR, Hawaii, Oct. 1 -- The 24-year-old George F. Elliott was the only transport sunk of the original invasion fleet that captured the Southern Solomon Islands in the first United Nations South Pacific offensive, it is possible to reveal today.
